name: Eximus Technologies
tag_list: php, ecommerce, website-development, web-design, joomla, wordpress, shopping-cart-development
overview:
Eximus Technologies is a professional website designing, website development and ecommerce solution company which ensure that you get the best web & software solutions within your budget.

Eximus Technologies provides a wide range of custom IT programming services. We specialize in the development of Ecommerce solution, Content Management System (CMS), Custom Website applications, Web design & Graphics design. We excel in many open source solutions like Joomla, Drupal, Magento, WordPress, OsCommerce and many more.
